becomeTasker.title: Become a Tasker
becomeTasker.subtitle: Join our community of skilled professionals and start earning by helping others. Complete your profile to get started.
becomeTasker.bioPlaceholder: Describe your experience, skills, and what services you can provide. This will help clients understand your expertise.
becomeTasker.serviceRadiusHint: How far are you willing to travel for jobs? (1-200 km)
becomeTasker.currentlyAvailable: I am currently available for new jobs
becomeTasker.profileReview: Your profile will be reviewed before going live. This usually takes 24-48 hours.
becomeTasker.termsAgreement: By becoming a tasker, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
becomeTasker.pleaseLogin: Please log in to become a tasker
becomeTasker.congratulations: Congratulations! You are now a tasker. Your profile is under review.

confirmSuccess.title: Email Confirmed!
confirmSuccess.subtitle: Your email has been successfully verified.
confirmSuccess.setupIssue: There was an issue setting up your account.
confirmSuccess.tryLoggingIn: Please try logging in to complete your account setup.
confirmSuccess.tryLoggingInToAccess: Please try logging in to access your account.
confirmSuccess.taskerWelcome: Welcome! Your account is ready. Let's complete your profile to start helping others.
confirmSuccess.customerWelcome: Welcome! Your account is ready. Let's show you how it works.
confirmSuccess.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

error.confirmationExpiredDesc: Your email confirmation link has expired. Please request a new one.
error.confirmationInvalidDesc: The confirmation link is invalid or has already been used.
error.alreadyConfirmedDesc: Your email has already been confirmed. You can now log in.
error.authenticationErrorDesc: An error occurred during the authentication process. Please try again.

finishSignUp.title: Finish Setting Up
finishSignUp.subtitle: You're almost there! Complete your tasker profile to start helping others and earning money.
finishSignUp.profileLoadError: Failed to load user profile. Please refresh the page.
finishSignUp.roleUpdateError: Failed to update user role. Please contact support.
finishSignUp.bioPlaceholder: Describe your experience, skills, and what services you can provide. This will help clients understand your expertise.
finishSignUp.phoneHint: This will help clients contact you directly
finishSignUp.serviceRadiusHint: How far are you willing to travel for jobs? (1-200 km)
finishSignUp.currentlyAvailable: I am currently available for new jobs
finishSignUp.idVerificationDesc: Please upload both sides of your government-issued ID for verification. This is required to become a tasker.
finishSignUp.clickToUploadFront: Click to upload front of ID
finishSignUp.clickToUploadBack: Click to upload back of ID
finishSignUp.ensureClear: • Ensure images are clear and readable
finishSignUp.profileReview: Your profile will be reviewed before going live. This usually takes 24-48 hours.
finishSignUp.termsAgreement: By completing your profile, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
finishSignUp.uploadBothIdDocuments: Please upload both front and back of your ID document
finishSignUp.userNotFound: User not found. Please try logging in again.
finishSignUp.profileCompletedSuccess: Profile completed successfully! Welcome to the tasker community.
finishSignUp.onlyForTaskers: This page is only for taskers
finishSignUp.alreadyCompletedProfile: You have already completed your profile!
finishSignUp.phoneHelp: This will help clients contact you directly
finishSignUp.uploadIdDescription: Please upload both sides of your government-issued ID for verification. This is required to become a tasker.
finishSignUp.termsAndPrivacy: By completing your profile, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
finishSignUp.uploadBothIdSides: Please upload both front and back of your ID document
finishSignUp.profileCompleted: Profile completed successfully! Welcome to the tasker community.
finishSignUp.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload JPG, PNG, or WebP files.
finishSignUp.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 5MB per image.
finishSignUp.alreadyCompleted: You have already completed your profile!

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
resetPassword.invalidCode: Invalid or expired reset link. Redirecting to login...
resetPassword.linkExpired: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been updated successfully. Redirecting to login...

waitForConfirmation.title: Check your email
waitForConfirmation.subtitle: We've sent you a verification code. Please check your inbox.
waitForConfirmation.otpInstructions: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your email address to verify your account.
waitForConfirmation.didntReceive: Didn't receive the code? Check your spam folder or try again.

verifyOTP.title: Verify Your Email
verifyOTP.description: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to {email}. Please enter it below.
verifyOTP.descriptionNoEmail: Please enter the 6-digit verification code we sent to your email address.
verifyOTP.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
verifyOTP.successMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. Redirecting to your profile...
verifyOTP.resendSuccessMessage: A new verification code has been sent to your email.
verifyOTP.resendFailed: Failed to resend code. Please try again later.
verifyOTP.resendPrompt: Didn't receive the code or it expired?

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
